koohiiStory1: This hearth is equipped with a fire-proof door. On the kanji you can see somewhat pictographically the fire-proof door keeping the fire behind, and nothing comes under the door primitive, where you would have expected to see another primitive.
koohiiStory2: -"Honey? Do we have any wood left for the hearth?" -"Aagh, just use the frickin´ door!".
